sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnctsnnmanage ( CTSNN_ID /* */ , USER_ID /* */ , CTSNN_CODE /* */ , REQST_DE /* */ , CTSNN_NM /* */ , TRGTER_NM /* */ , BRTHDY /* */ , OCCRRNC_DE /* */ , RELATE /* */ , RM /* */ , SANCTNER_ID /* */ , CONFM_AT /* */ , SANCTN_DT /* */ , RETURN_RESN /* */ , INFRML_SANCTN_ID /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #ctsnnId# /* */ , #userId# /* */ , #ctsnnCode# /* */ , #reqstDe# /* */ , #ctsnnNm# /* */ , #trgterNm# /* */ , #brthdy# /* */ , #occrrncDe# /* */ , #relate# /* */ , #rm# /* */ , #sanctnerId# /* */ , #confmAt# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #returnResn# /* */ , #infrmlSanctnId# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnctsnnmanage SET CTSNN_ID=#ctsnnId# /* */ , USER_ID=#userId# /* */ , CTSNN_CODE=#ctsnnCode# /* */ , REQST_DE=#reqstDe# /* */ , CTSNN_NM=#ctsnnNm# /* */ , TRGTER_NM=#trgterNm# /* */ , BRTHDY=#brthdy# /* */ , OCCRRNC_DE=#occrrncDe# /* */ , RELATE=#relate# /* */ , RM=#rm# /* */ , SANCTNER_ID=#sanctnerId# /* */ , CONFM_AT=#confmAt# /* */ , SANCTN_DT=#sanctnDt# /* */ , RETURN_RESN=#returnResn# /* */ , INFRML_SANCTN_ID=#infrmlSanctnId# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE CTSNN_ID=#ctsnnId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT CTSNN_ID /* */ , USER_ID /* */ , CTSNN_CODE /* */ , REQST_DE /* */ , CTSNN_NM /* */ , TRGTER_NM /* */ , BRTHDY /* */ , OCCRRNC_DE /* */ , RELATE /* */ , RM /* */ , SANCTNER_ID /* */ , CONFM_AT /* */ , SANCTN_DT /* */ , RETURN_RESN /* */ , INFRML_SANCTN_ID /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnctsnnmanage WHERE CTSNN_ID=#ctsnnId# /* */

SELECT CTSNN_ID /* */ , USER_ID /* */ , CTSNN_CODE /* */ , REQST_DE /* */ , CTSNN_NM /* */ , TRGTER_NM /* */ , BRTHDY /* */ , OCCRRNC_DE /* */ , RELATE /* */ , RM /* */ , SANCTNER_ID /* */ , CONFM_AT /* */ , SANCTN_DT /* */ , RETURN_RESN /* */ , INFRML_SANCTN_ID /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnctsnnmanage WHERE 1=1
CTSNN_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY CTSNN_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnctsnnmanage WHERE 1=1
CTSNN_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
